verses.text: Thus \w King|strong="H4430"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* ordered \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w search|strong="H1240"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w archives|strong="H1005"\w* \w stored|strong="H5182"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w treasury|strong="H1596"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* Babylon.

\w And|strong="H4076"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w scroll|strong="H4040"\w* \w was|strong="H1459"\w* \w found|strong="H7912"\w* \w in|strong="H7912"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* fortress \w of|strong="H4083"\w* Ecbatana, \w in|strong="H7912"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w province|strong="H4083"\w* \w of|strong="H4083"\w* \w Media|strong="H4076"\w*, with \w the|strong="H1768"\w* following \w written|strong="H3790"\w* on it: \w Memorandum|strong="H1799"\w*:

\w In|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w first|strong="H2298"\w* \w year|strong="H8140"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w King|strong="H4430"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w*, \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w issued|strong="H7761"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w decree|strong="H2942"\w* \w concerning|strong="H2942"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* God \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*: Let \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w be|strong="H1005"\w* \w rebuilt|strong="H1124"\w* \w as|strong="H1768"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* place \w for|strong="H1768"\w* offering \w sacrifices|strong="H1685"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* let its foundations \w be|strong="H1005"\w* firmly \w laid|strong="H7761"\w*. It \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w be|strong="H1005"\w* \w sixty|strong="H8361"\w* cubits high \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w sixty|strong="H8361"\w* cubits \w wide|strong="H6613"\w*,

with \w three|strong="H8532"\w* \w layers|strong="H5073"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* cut stones \w and|strong="H4430"\w* one \w of|strong="H4481"\w* timbers. \w The|strong="H4481"\w* \w costs|strong="H5313"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w to|strong="H4481"\w* \w be|strong="H1005"\w* \w paid|strong="H3052"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w royal|strong="H4430"\w* \w treasury|strong="H1005"\w*.

Furthermore, \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* \w and|strong="H1722"\w* \w silver|strong="H3702"\w* articles \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* God, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w took|strong="H5312"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w in|strong="H5182"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w* \w and|strong="H1722"\w* carried \w to|strong="H3390"\w* Babylon, must \w also|strong="H4481"\w* \w be|strong="H1005"\w* \w returned|strong="H8421"\w* \w to|strong="H3390"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w in|strong="H5182"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w* \w and|strong="H1722"\w* deposited \w in|strong="H5182"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* God.

\w Therefore|strong="H4481"\w* Darius decreed: \w To|strong="H4481"\w* \w Tattenai|strong="H8674"\w* \w governor|strong="H6347"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w region|strong="H5675"\w* west \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* Euphrates, \w Shethar-bozenai|strong="H8370"\w*, \w and|strong="H1934"\w* \w your|strong="H1768"\w* associates \w and|strong="H1934"\w* officials \w in|strong="H8536"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w region|strong="H5675"\w*: \w You|strong="H1768"\w* must stay \w away|strong="H7352"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w place|strong="H1934"\w*!

\w Leave|strong="H7662"\w* \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w work|strong="H5673"\w* \w on|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* God \w alone|strong="H7662"\w*. Let \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w governor|strong="H6347"\w* \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w elders|strong="H7868"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w* \w rebuild|strong="H1124"\w* \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* God \w on|strong="H5922"\w* its original site.

\w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w hereby|strong="H4481"\w* \w decree|strong="H2942"\w* \w what|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* must \w do|strong="H5648"\w* \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w these|strong="H4481"\w* \w elders|strong="H7868"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w* \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w rebuilding|strong="H1124"\w* \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* God: \w The|strong="H4481"\w* \w cost|strong="H5313"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w be|strong="H1934"\w* \w paid|strong="H3052"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* full \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w these|strong="H4481"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w royal|strong="H4430"\w* \w treasury|strong="H5232"\w* \w out|strong="H5648"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w taxes|strong="H4061"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* provinces west \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* Euphrates, \w so|strong="H1768"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* work \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w be|strong="H1934"\w* hindered.

\w Whatever|strong="H4101"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* needed—\w young|strong="H1123"\w* \w bulls|strong="H8450"\w*, \w rams|strong="H1798"\w*, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* lambs \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5928"\w* \w offerings|strong="H5928"\w* \w to|strong="H3390"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* God \w of|strong="H1123"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, \w as|strong="H1768"\w* well \w as|strong="H1768"\w* \w wheat|strong="H2591"\w*, \w salt|strong="H4416"\w*, \w wine|strong="H2562"\w*, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w oil|strong="H4887"\w*, \w as|strong="H1768"\w* requested \w by|strong="H3549"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w priests|strong="H3549"\w* \w in|strong="H7960"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*—must \w be|strong="H1934"\w* \w given|strong="H3052"\w* \w to|strong="H3390"\w* \w them|strong="H3052"\w* \w daily|strong="H3118"\w* \w without|strong="H3809"\w* \w fail|strong="H7960"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1768"\w* \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w be|strong="H1934"\w* able \w to|strong="H4430"\w* \w offer|strong="H7127"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H5208"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sweet aroma \w to|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* God \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w to|strong="H4430"\w* \w pray|strong="H6739"\w* \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w lives|strong="H2417"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H1768"\w* \w sons|strong="H1123"\w*.

\w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w also|strong="H4481"\w* \w decree|strong="H2942"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* if \w any|strong="H3606"\w* man interferes \w with|strong="H5648"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w directive|strong="H6600"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* beam \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w be|strong="H1005"\w* \w torn|strong="H5648"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w and|strong="H1005"\w* raised \w up|strong="H2211"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w be|strong="H1005"\w* \w impaled|strong="H2211"\w* \w on|strong="H5922"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w*. \w And|strong="H1005"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* own \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w shall|strong="H3606"\w* \w be|strong="H1005"\w* \w made|strong="H5648"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pile \w of|strong="H4481"\w* rubble \w for|strong="H5922"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* offense.

May God, \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w has|strong="H1768"\w* caused \w His|strong="H7972"\w* \w Name|strong="H8036"\w* \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w dwell|strong="H7932"\w* \w there|strong="H8536"\w*, \w overthrow|strong="H4049"\w* \w any|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w or|strong="H4430"\w* \w people|strong="H5972"\w* \w who|strong="H1768"\w* lifts \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3028"\w* \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w alter|strong="H8133"\w* \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w decree|strong="H2942"\w* \w or|strong="H4430"\w* \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w destroy|strong="H2255"\w* \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* God \w in|strong="H8133"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*. \w I|strong="H1768"\w*, \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w*, \w have|strong="H7761"\w* \w issued|strong="H7761"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w decree|strong="H2942"\w*. Let it \w be|strong="H1005"\w* \w carried|strong="H5648"\w* \w out|strong="H5648"\w* \w with|strong="H5648"\w* diligence.

\w In|strong="H4430"\w* response, \w Tattenai|strong="H8674"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w governor|strong="H6347"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w region|strong="H5675"\w* west \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* Euphrates, \w Shethar-bozenai|strong="H8370"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* their associates diligently \w carried|strong="H5648"\w* \w out|strong="H5648"\w* \w what|strong="H1768"\w* \w King|strong="H4430"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* decreed.

\w So|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w Jewish|strong="H3062"\w* \w elders|strong="H7868"\w* \w built|strong="H1124"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w prospered|strong="H6744"\w* through \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w prophesying|strong="H5017"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w Haggai|strong="H2292"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5029"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w* \w son|strong="H1247"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w Iddo|strong="H5714"\w*. They \w finished|strong="H3635"\w* \w building|strong="H1124"\w* \w according|strong="H4481"\w* \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w command|strong="H2942"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* God \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* decrees \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w*, \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* Artaxerxes, \w kings|strong="H4430"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w Persia|strong="H6540"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w completed|strong="H3319"\w* \w on|strong="H5705"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w third|strong="H8532"\w* \w day|strong="H3118"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w month|strong="H3393"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* Adar, \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w sixth|strong="H8353"\w* \w year|strong="H8140"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w reign|strong="H4437"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w King|strong="H4430"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w*.

Then \w the|strong="H5648"\w* people \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w*—\w the|strong="H5648"\w* \w priests|strong="H3549"\w*, \w the|strong="H5648"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3879"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H5648"\w* \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H5648"\w* \w exiles|strong="H1123"\w*—\w celebrated|strong="H5648"\w* \w the|strong="H5648"\w* \w dedication|strong="H2597"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H5648"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* God \w with|strong="H5648"\w* \w joy|strong="H2305"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w dedication|strong="H2597"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* God \w they|strong="H3606"\w* \w offered|strong="H7127"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3969"\w* \w bulls|strong="H8450"\w*, \w two|strong="H8648"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3969"\w* \w rams|strong="H1798"\w*, four \w hundred|strong="H3969"\w* lambs, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sin|strong="H2409"\w* \w offering|strong="H7127"\w* \w for|strong="H5922"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w twelve|strong="H8648"\w* \w male|strong="H6841"\w* \w goats|strong="H5796"\w*, \w one|strong="H1836"\w* \w for|strong="H5922"\w* each tribe \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w*.

\w They|strong="H1768"\w* also \w appointed|strong="H6966"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w priests|strong="H3549"\w* \w by|strong="H3549"\w* their \w divisions|strong="H6392"\w* \w and|strong="H3792"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3879"\w* \w by|strong="H3549"\w* their groups \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w service|strong="H5673"\w* \w of|strong="H5922"\w* God \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, according \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w what|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w written|strong="H3792"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w Book|strong="H5609"\w* \w of|strong="H5922"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4873"\w*.

\w On|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w fourteenth|strong="H6240"\w* \w day|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w exiles|strong="H1473"\w* \w kept|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Passover|strong="H6453"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w purified|strong="H2891"\w* \w themselves|strong="H1992"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* ceremonially \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w slaughtered|strong="H7819"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Passover|strong="H6453"\w* lamb \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w exiles|strong="H1473"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w priestly|strong="H3548"\w* \w brothers|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w themselves|strong="H1992"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w exile|strong="H1473"\w* ate \w it|strong="H7725"\w*, together \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* separated themselves \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* peoples \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w kept|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Feast|strong="H2282"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w Bread|strong="H4682"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w joyful|strong="H8055"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w turned|strong="H5437"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Assyria \w toward|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w strengthen|strong="H2388"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
